title: 3D structures of the base of small-scale recurrent jets revealed by Solar orbiter
summary: This paper investigates the 3D structure at the base of solar jets using Solar Orbiter observations, analyzing their formation and evolution, which involves spatio-temporal dynamics.
usefulness_reason: The paper discusses the formation and evolution of solar jets and their 3D structure, implying spatio-temporal dynamics. While not directly about point processes or contextual datasets, it is relevant to spatio-temporal data analysis.
